doc.previous: The former Volume II has been incorporated into the primary volume to save space and production cost For similar reasons the book is now published on a larger page size These two changes allow the publisher to present a single comprehensive navigation science reference which explains modern navigational methods while respecting traditional ones The goal of the changes was to put as much useful information before the navigator as possible in the most understandable and readable format
